name: Unwind
description:
Sit back and Unwind, exploring the worlds and building your cabin up.

Grab a pair of shears and head out, grab a plant and bring it home. At the moment, you can jar it or plant it, but in the near future, the introduction of a fully functional trade system will give you more choice on what you get for each. As well as a seed mill to convert a single plant into many that grow as you play!

Plants not your thing? Get your trusty net and hunt down some insects. At the moment, there is only 8 types of butterflies, but future releases will bring more variety and sound to the surrounding forest, with grass hoppers, beetles and moths at night to be caught.

Hows the view! Not to your liking? Grab an axe and go remove the obstacle. Dont forget to collect the wood, you never know what you might be able to build with it.

The choice is yours as to how to play. The tools are there, get out and explore! As we progress down the line, more activities will become available.
Activities include:
  • Seed milling and trade with MULTIPLE forms of life, located around the worlds.
  • An expansive mine system for you to explore and gather resources to trade.
  • Full freedom to construct a building to your own liking. No overlap prevention, get wild.
  • A wider array of wildlife to collect, a third biome for random plants to grow and more plant variety.
  • FISHING! What fun is a chill game if you cant fish?!
  • More down the line, im sure. With your input, theres no end to what we can make!

Unwind is a game where there is no time limit, no crunch, just you and your creativity. Decorate your world however you see fit, or stockpile resources and construct your own castle.

While in alpha, things are bound to change, and i have much i aim to add to the world.
